concept.title: What is XML
concept.shortdesc: This document explains what XML (Extensible Markup Language) is

conbody.p: Extensible Markup Language (XML) is a markup language that defines a set of rules for encoding documents in a format that is both human-readable and machine-readable. The World Wide Web Consortium's XML 1.0 Specification of 1998 and several other related specifications—all of them free open standards—define XML.
